author: #s#8059
HRAND5#0101
description: This cog allows members to give other members reputation. This reputation will then be stored in a database. Based on the database, further things can be done. For example, a leaderboard for the people with the most reps can be shown, people can look up their own reputation, and people that have a sufficient amount of reputation and have recently received reputation could also obtain a role (configurable).
end_user_data_statement: This module stores all +rep messages, their timestamp, and the username+ID of the source and target. Due to possible operational hazards when automatically deleting reputations, any removal requests must be treated manually, and must ensure abuse is prevented.
install_msg: Thank you for installing our cog!
short: Give people reputation and reward reputable members
name: Reputation
